newsitem.title: CHINA: Inner Mongolia Erdos 96 net profit up 2.8 percent.
newsitem.headline: Inner Mongolia Erdos 96 net profit up 2.8 percent.

text.p: (in millions of yuan unless stated, against 1995 figures)
Net asset per share 2.488 yuan vs 2.225 yuan
Earnings per share 0.55 yuan vs 0.52 yuan
Company name: Inner Mongolia Erdos Cashmere Products Co Ltd
Note: The results were published in a company statement. The net profit numbers are based on international accounting standards, other figures are based on domestic accounting standards.
Based on domestic accounting standards, the 1996 net profit was 185.967 million yuan against 173.38 million yuan in 1995.
The company's board of directors proposed a pre-tax cash dividend of 0.32 yuan per share from 1996 profits, pending the approval of shareholders, the statement said.
